attributes.action: add a box to the bottom of the voting forms of all national and local elections that gives the voter the opportunity to choose none of the above
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Does what it says on the tin and would be a great way of stopping idiots from being elected to positions of authority.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister does not have control over how the voting system works. We suggest you send your suggestion to the Electoral Commission (http://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/)
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
